page.title: 01 North East of Chippenham
page.content:
This area of Wiltshire lies to the North East of the town of{Chippenham,} and contains part of the town.
It is mainly farmland and includes a number of villages, the two largest being{Kington Langley}and{Langley {Burrell.}The farms are mainly arable.
The area of{Chippenham}included in this block contains one very large factory and a new industrial estate as well as a large residential area.
Both the River Avon and the main London to Bristol Railway run through this block, as well as the Swindon to Chippenham road.
